title: News24.com | US could start reopening in May, top virus advisor says
description: The United States may be ready to start gradually reopening next month, the government's top infectious diseases expert said Sunday, as signs grew that the coronavirus pandemic was peaking.
content:
The United States may be ready to start gradually reopening next month, the government's top infectious diseases expert said on Sunday, as signs grew that the coronavirus pandemic was peaking.
